entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
